    DefaultView

  • Classes in oogasalad.engine.view used by oogasalad.engine.view
    Class
    Description
    DefaultView
    This class represents the current view that a user sees.
    Display
    This is an abstract class representing any visual component in the game.
    GameAppViewTest.MockDefaultView
     
    LevelDisplay
    This class is the view for a level in a game.
    ObjectImage
    The ObjectImage class represents a visual object in the game world, composed of an ImageView for the sprite and a Rectangle hitbox for interactions or debugging.
    ViewAPI
    Represents the primary view interface for the game application.
    ViewState
    Holds the internal state needed to manage the current view of the application, such as stage, current display, input keys, and game manager reference.
